Address.label: Address
Address.value: 52 SUNRISE PARK ROAD, NEW HAMPTON, New York, 10958, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Balchem Corp develops, manufactures, distributes, and markets specialty performance ingredients and products for the nutritional, food, pharmaceutical, animal health, medical device sterilization, plant nutrition, and industrial markets. The company offers a wide variety of product lines, with some highly customized and others commodity-oriented. The company operates through three segments - Human Nutrition and Health, Animal Nutrition and Health, and Specialty Products. Geographically, it generates majority of the revenue from the United States.

value.name: Michael Sestrick
value.title: Chief Technology Officer & Senior Vice President
